2025-06-17.content: Support for the [Ruby 3.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/flexible/ruby/runtime) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Ruby 3.4 runtime now available
summary.summary: Ruby 3.4 runtime is now generally available for App Engine flexible environment.
